\w The|strong="H3588"\w* old error \w is|strong="H3588"\w* passed away: thou wilt \w keep|strong="H5341"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H0982"\w* hoped \w in|strong="H0982"\w* thee.

\w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, thou wilt give \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou hast \w wrought|strong="H4639"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w works|strong="H4639"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.
